programme.title: Provocative
programme.desc: Tess goes to great lengths to help an ex-offender rebuild her confidence and bond with her daughter. Venya panics when Viknesh goes missing.

programme.title: The Good Karma Hospital S4
programme.desc: 'The Good Karma Hospital' follows doctor Ruby Walker who swaps England for India and finds herself at an under-resourced and over-worked cottage hospital run by eccentric Englishwoman Lydia Fonseca (Amanda Redman).

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S41

programme.title: Celebrity Wheel of Fortune: Season 03
programme.desc: Various celebrities compete against each other by solving word puzzles in order to win cash prizes that are determined by a spinning wheel.

programme.title: Celebrity Catch Phrase S8
programme.desc: In this entertaining series packed with laughs, celebrity contestants attempt to work out catchphrases based on fun animations. Animations include well known phrases, sayings and even film, song and book titles. The celebrities need to buzz in as quickly as they can when they know the answer and can say what they see in a chance to win money for their chosen charities.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Everything you've ever wanted to know about Europe - from traditions and habits to culture shocks and record breakers.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal Australia S12
programme.desc: The exhilarating hit game show where contestants must beat The Banker to win a huge cash prize, is making a triumphant return. The ultimate contest of nerve, luck and pure gut instinct will be fronted by one of Australia's most beloved TV presenters, Gold Logie winner Grant Denyer.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S6
programme.desc: The junior version of this global phenomenon returns, hosted by triple BAFTA-winning comedian HarryHill. This series sees pastry chef and food writer Ravneet Gill join the team as a new judge alongside Bake Off alumnus Liam Charles. It's a mouth-watering journey, as 16 of the country's best young bakers compete. A joyful way of getting children passionate about food.

programme.title: Supa Strikas S7
programme.desc: Follow Shakes, Rasta and the rest of the Supa Strikas on their quest to become the world's greatest football team!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst QuadDrive
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Malay) The story centers on Bel Daizora, the leader of the Bey graveyard "Phantom's Gate". Bel, who holds Destruction Belfyre, declares war on Bladers across the world. With Ranzo Kiyama and Bashara Suiro, their journey unfolds as Bel advances to becoming the Dark Prince.

programme.title: Squared Zebra S1
programme.desc: Polly the striped zebra, Rodion the elephant, Gosha the crocodile, Yana the monkey, Pasha the ostrich and his little brother Petya the egg-- happily live in a jungle on a faraway island, where every day is full of adventures (and the occasional arguments). With Squared Zebra by their side, the friends learn to appreciate the beauty of the world and to value individual traits in both others and themselves!

programme.title: Lil Wild S3
programme.desc: On a hot summer day at the Lil Wild Sanctuary, Rara goes through a grueling obstacle course in order to train to be the next junior matriarch. Meanwhile, at a nearby dig site, Chen Bao, a young quirky archaeologist comes close to a discovery of a lifetime!

programme.title: Lil Wild S3
programme.desc: While Nora thinks Rara is not ready to be the next junior matriarch, Rara is keen to prove her wrong by taking charge and keeping the Sanctuary cool from the summer heat. Elsewhere, Floogie the humble shrew, discovers a crack on the dome of the Silica mining empire.

programme.title: Space Nova S2
programme.desc: It's 2162 and following the Novas incredible meeting with the Stardustians, everything we thought we knew about the universe has changed. Even the Novas' home base, Luna Port has become a major space station, home to entire new fields of science and learning. Still, despite all their incredible adventures, the Novas' greatest quest is ahead of them; they've just been invited to visit the Stardustian homeworld!

programme.title: Makan Time Stories S3
programme.desc: What makes a home—and a family? A beatboxer, a love song to chicken rice, and an original jam session set the tone. Chef Chris turns humble ingredients into a Polish stew, while a magical Bohri feast brings everyone to the table. And what do Black Soldier Flies have to do with our future? Makan Time Stories connects it all.

programme.title: Scene City: One Last Dance
programme.desc: Still mourning the death of his late grandmother, a shy and reclusive teenage boy spends the last days in his childhood home holed up in his room, listening to her favourite song on the cassette player she left him. The day before moving out, he follows his friends to the beach but gets roughed up and loses the precious heirloom in the process. With time ticking, he must find it quickly before his parents realise - and before he loses the song forever.

programme.title: Red Eye (UK)
programme.desc: The series follows DC Hana Li, a British-Chinese police officer who escorts Dr. Matthew Nolan, a murder suspect, back to Beijing. However, Hana suspects foul play when an incident occurs on the flight. Hana's sister, Jess, a journalist, helps uncover the conspiracy in London.

programme.title: The Librarians S3
programme.desc: The strange death of a man exploding in flames sends Jake, Cassandra and Ezekiel to a wellness retreat like no other. Meanwhile Flynn and Baird spend some much needed time alone.

programme.title: Modern Marvels: Machines
programme.desc: Adam learns the true meaning of "heavy" when he visits legendary heavy equipment manufacturer: John Deere. Big machines do big jobs and he gets an inside look at how top brands like SANY and JCB are pushing the envelope on what these machines can do. Then, we'll take a nostalgic look at where many fell in love with heavy machinery, TONKA TRUCKS! Plus, we get the inside scoop on massive mining machines that can skim mere inches or scour literal truckloads of material at a time.

programme.title: Whispers Of The Dead
programme.desc: The death of a domestic helper causes friction between two nations. Ignoring the tense political climate, Prof Chao remains neutral in his search for the truth.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: Are teens in Singapore using AI as their study buddy – or are they replacing their brains? Munah Bagharib sits down with secondary school students to find out how they are using AI for homework.

programme.title: Hoarders S12
programme.desc: A reality-TV show that features compulsive hoarders--people who are addicted to filling their homes with objects--and how that spills out into their lives. Forrest grew up in the projects and would tell his son stories about a pair of shoes he couldn't afford when he was younger; Forrest is facing extreme financial pressure from daily fines from the Homeowners Association.

programme.desc: 凌渊的人动手，唐笑无声无息死在唐家地窖。而云襄告诉舒亚男，他苦苦寻找的仇家竟与苏家有关，舒雅楠担心云襄找苏鸣玉寻仇，但云襄此时心急着救莫爷。与此同时，一个黑衣女子将舒亚男带去见昨日的神秘人，此人名为寇元杰，是凌渊少主，而舒亚男真实身份是凌渊大小姐，真名为寇莲衣。寇元杰质问寇莲衣，离家三年说要寻找制衡南宫放的良策，如今却和云台的云襄勾搭在一起，寇莲衣称南宫放虽为凌渊的人，但行事手段和云台何其相似，因此她留在云襄身边，想学到手段日后制衡南宫放。.

programme.title: 川味 第四季(下)
programme.desc: 川菜之根在于味；川菜之魂之在于文化；川菜之美在于融合，容纳百川，不断壮其气势。所谓“尚滋味，好辛香”，其核心体现便是川菜着重调味，川人善于造味，无论是外来物种，还是本土香料，都在川人的手中汇聚，反复地拿捏与调和形成多种味型，家常味、怪味、鱼香味、烟香味、椒盐味、荔枝味……所以，虽然川味以麻辣著称，麻辣却不是它的起点或终点。本集彬歌导演将带大家更深刻地体会川味之“味”，感受它的本源与去向，品尝它的的纷繁与和谐…….

programme.title: 云襄传
programme.desc: 因为熔银需要大量的炭，寇元杰令叶枭大量购炭，被莫爷发现，云襄和莫爷决定跟随炭车找到藏银地，寇莲衣主动请缨同去。炭车十分狡猾，还有几辆掩人耳目，云襄判断了确切方向，寇连衣去查看情况。与此同时，柳公权和明珠郡主也到了附近，柳公权察觉到有人跟踪，寇莲衣回来告诉云襄和莫不凡，江南神捕也在附近，不可轻举妄动。康乔更加怀疑寇连衣，再次提醒云襄。.

programme.title: 吃货横扫曼谷
programme.desc: 因为疫情，不少朋友已数年未有外游。泰国曼谷向来是大家的旅游热点之一，阔别近三年，大家或已对当地感到陌生。三位「女神」高海宁、彭慧中、陈星妤联同「少年食神」林澄光率先探路，穿梭曼谷的大街小巷，发掘隐世地道美食与打卡景点。近年流行素食，主持们也会化身「找素」达人，介绍曼谷的滋味素食。游泰国当然不能错过「叹SPA」，女神们会亲身上阵体验各式SPA，务求为观众揭开最高CP值的叹世界攻略。.

programme.title: 那一年的除夕夜

programme.title: 那一年的除夕夜
programme.desc: 原来那天沈悦来找流浪汉，误会他和依文的关系。两人也因此确定感情。时间来到了3月4号，就在沈悦洗澡的时候，沈时跑了出去。眼看他即将被车子撞，幸好流浪汉及时出现救了他。沈时才恍然今天是他死期，沈悦答应流浪汉的求婚，沈时终于喝到女婿茶。医院，门开，见晨曦走了进来，原来是流浪汉带晨曦穿越来到2024年！.
